'''''Amon Hen'' 292''' is the two-hundred-and-ninety-second issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in December [[2021]].

==Contents==
* Front cover:  Rivendell by Allison Hudgins

* '''2''' - From the Editor’s Desk
* '''5''' - Dating Tolkien by Mick Henr
* '''6''' - Tolkien and Robin Hood by Bob Blackham
* '''9''' - The Shadow of the Past by Quickbeam
* '''10''' - Reunited at last: The Aubusson Moria Gate Tapestry by Denis Bridoux
* '''14''' - Belladona Took by Kathrin Heierli
* '''15''' - Speculation on the origins of the Forsaken Inn by Sebastián Alejandro Freigeiro
* '''18''' - Centerfold:“Christmas with the Fellowship“ by Kaitlyn Facista
* '''22''' - Tolkien Treasury by Andy Bird
* '''28''' - Mathom
* '''30''' - Behind Glass Doors
* '''32''' - News From Fangorn
* '''33''' - The Lord of the Rings - Fellowship of the Ring by Aniruddha Iyer Bali
* '''34''' - All Brân
* Back cover: Midgewater to Weathertop by Soni Alcorn-Hender
